def main() -> None:
    """Main function for the project."""
    print("Starting JVM...")
    jvm.start(packages=True, logging_level=0)
    clear_console()
    try:  # type: ignore
        weka_simulation(EXTRACTIONS, 0.01, 0.7, 100)
        weka_simulation(EXTRACTIONS, 0.02, 0.7, 100)
    except Exception as e:  # type: ignore
        print(e)

determine_if_rules_validate
peekOfCode:
def determine_if_rules_validate(metrics: dict[str, float]) -> bool:
    """Determine if the rules validate"""
    return all(
        [
            metrics["profit_factor"] >= VALIDATION_METRICS["profit_factor"],
            metrics["profit_factor_train"] >= VALIDATION_METRICS["profit_factor_train"],
            metrics["profit_factor_test"] >= VALIDATION_METRICS["profit_factor_test"],
            metrics["porcentaje_ganadoras"]
            >= VALIDATION_METRICS["porcentaje_ganadoras"],
            metrics["trades"] >= VALIDATION_METRICS["trades"],

def process_csv(file_path: str) -> tuple[pd.DataFrame, pd.DataFrame]:
    """Process the csv file to get the dataframe"""
    df = df_from_csv(file_path)
    df = convert_to_time("Date", "time", "Datetime", df)
    df, df_market = separate_market_information_from(df)
    df = transform_label_into_numeric(df, "LABEL")
    return df, df_market

def remove_market_information_from_extraction(
    df: pd.DataFrame,
) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Remove the market information from extraction
    """
    # Keep "time" column in the final dataframe
    cols = [col for col in MARKET_COL_NAMES if col != "time"]
    return df.drop(cols, axis=1)  # type: ignore

label: get_dataframe_with_new_target
get_correlation_with_label

def get_correlation_with_label(
    dataframe: pd.DataFrame,
    alt_target_col_name: str,
    new_target_col_name: str,
) -> pd.DataFrame:
    """
    Get the dataframe with the new target
    """
    cor: pd.DataFrame = abs(dataframe.corr())[[alt_target_col_name]]
    cor.drop(cor.tail(1).index, inplace=True)  # type: ignore

label: calculate_rule_metrics
peekOfCode:
def calculate_rule_metrics(
    df: pd.DataFrame, ripper_clf: Any, train: pd.DataFrame, test: pd.DataFrame
) -> bool:
    """Calculate the metrics for the rules"""
    breakpoint()
    predict_train = ripper_clf.predict(train)  # type: ignore
    predict_test = ripper_clf.predict(test)  # type: ignore
    # TODO: Refactor to split concerns
    shift = -2
    df["Prediction"] = np.append(predict_train, predict_test)  # type: ignore

class SeedMode(Enum):
    """Seed mode"""
    RANDOM = "RANDOM"
    SEQUENTIAL = "SEQUENTIAL"
def load_file_to_classify(url: str) -> weka.core.dataset.Instances:
    """Load the file to classify"""
    loader = Loader(classname="weka.core.converters.CSVLoader")
    data = loader.load_file(url)  # type: ignore
    data.class_is_last()
    return data

def run_attribute_selection(data: Any, ranker_threshold: float = 0.01) -> Any:
    """Run the attribute selection"""
    attribute_selection = Filter(
        classname="weka.filters.supervised.attribute.AttributeSelection",
        options=[
            "-E",
            "weka.attributeSelection.CorrelationAttributeEval ",
            "-S",
            f"weka.attributeSelection.Ranker -T {ranker_threshold} -N -1",
        ],
